Admission Information.general_info: Admissions are open for undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs at NIT Trichy. The admission process follows national-level entrance exams like JEE for B.Tech and GATE for M.Tech. For MBA, CAT scores are required, and for MSc programs, JAM is considered.

eligibility.BTech: JEE Main score followed by JoSAA Counseling.
eligibility.MTech: GATE score followed by CCMT Counseling.
eligibility.MBA: Valid CAT score with GD and PI rounds.
eligibility.MSc: Admission based on IIT JAM scores.
eligibility.PhD: Based on a written test and interview conducted by the respective department.

Admission Information.application_process: Apply online through the respective exam portals (JoSAA for B.Tech, CCMT for M.Tech, and CAT for MBA). Register, submit required documents, and participate in the counseling rounds.

important_dates.BTech: Applications open in April, seat allotment begins in July.
important_dates.MTech: Registration starts in March, seat allocation in June.
important_dates.MBA: Application process starts in November, with admission finalized in April.

Fee Structure.BTech: INR 1,25,000 per semester (excluding hostel and mess fees).
Fee Structure.MTech: INR 75,000 per semester (excluding hostel and mess fees).
Fee Structure.PhD: Tuition fee waived, with a stipend of INR 31,000 per month.

Placement Information.highest_package: INR 42 LPA (offered by an international tech firm).
Placement Information.placement_percentage: 95% of students placed in top companies.
Placement Information.internship_opportunities: Pre-placement offers (PPOs) are common through summer internships at reputed firms.

About the College.history: NIT Trichy, established in 1964, is one of India's premier engineering institutions. It is known for its academic excellence, research output, and strong industry connections.
About the College.location: NIT Trichy is located in Tamil Nadu, India, with a sprawling 800-acre campus.
About the College.ranking: Ranked among the top 10 engineering institutions in India by NIRF.

Campus Facilities.library: The central library has over 2 lakh books, digital resources, and 24/7 study spaces.
Campus Facilities.sports: Facilities include a football field, cricket ground, swimming pool, and indoor stadium.
Campus Facilities.labs: Advanced research labs in AI, robotics, and materials engineering.
Campus Facilities.hostel: Separate hostels for boys and girls with WiFi, mess, and recreational areas.

Research Opportunities.funding: Research grants available from DST, CSIR, and industry collaborations.
Research Opportunities.internships: Opportunities with IITs, foreign universities, and leading R&D firms.

Alumni Network.mentorship: Alumni mentorship programs are available for students.

Clubs and Extracurricular Activities.entrepreneurship: Entrepreneurship Cell (E-Cell) helps students start their own ventures.

Scholarship Opportunities.merit_scholarships: Students with CGPA above 8.5 are eligible for merit-based scholarships covering up to 50% of tuition fees.
Scholarship Opportunities.need_based: Students from economically weaker sections can apply for full or partial fee waivers.
Scholarship Opportunities.corporate_scholarships: Companies like Tata and Infosys offer scholarships to outstanding students.
